name: Python
description: A versatile, high-level programming language known for its readability and wide use in data science, web development, and automation.

name: JavaScript
description: A dynamic programming language primarily used for web development to create interactive front-end and back-end applications.

name: Java
description: A robust, object-oriented language used for enterprise applications, Android development, and large-scale systems.

name: C++
description: A powerful, high-performance language used for system programming, game development, and real-time applications.

name: Rust
description: A modern systems programming language focused on safety and performance, ideal for low-level programming and web assembly.
